title: The Cellist
brief_description: Guy is returning to Australia when he is befriended by Les. We learn that Guy is a cellist with the London Philharmonic, coming home to see his daughter. However, when the daughter fails to meet him, Guy is taken home to stay with Les’s family. He gets to know Lorraine… Cast: Guy Roper - Rhys McConnachie Lorraine - Tracey Higginson Les Batson - John Clayton with a cameo appearance by James Morrison as the trumpet cyclist.
